title: Understanding Cluster C
text: Cluster C personality disorders are characterized by a common theme. Think about the general behavior patterns associated with these disorders.

title: Common Traits in Cluster C
text: Cluster C disorders often involve behaviors that are related to anxiety and fear. Consider how these emotions might manifest in personality disorders.

title: Identifying Cluster C Characteristics
text: What is the common theme shared by Cluster C personality disorders?
choices: paranoid personality disorder, schizoid personality disorder, and schizotypal personality disorder
antisocial, borderline, histrionic, and narcissistic personality disorders
